NEAR Checkers

Compilation of [Rust code "Rusty checkers"](https://github.com/dboone/rusty-checkers), [Plain Javascript UI](https://github.com/codethejason/checkers) and some glue from [near-api-js](https://docs.near.org/docs/api/javascript-library).

[DEMO // NEAR Mainnet](https://checkers.nearspace.info/)

User Interface: https://github.com/zavodil/near-checkers-ui

Some Rules:
- Set a bid and join waiting list or select an available player to start the game.
- Winner gets a bank
- Invite a friend to get a 10% referral bonus from his rewards.
- Hold shift button (or check a checkbox) to perform a double jump. Release a shift button before a final move.
- If you spent more than an hour, your opponent may stop the game and get the reward.
- Service fee is 10%, referral reward is half of the service fee.
- Various game stats are storing onchain

How to deploy
==================

- Create & deploy game contract (`/contract`)

`yarn build:contract`

`near deploy app.checkers.near --wasmFile=./out/main.wasm --accountId app.checkers.near`

- Create NFT contract (`/nft-contract`)

`export CONTRACT_NAME=nft-checkers.near`

`yarn build:nft-contract`

- Deploy NFT contract

`near deploy $CONTRACT_NAME --wasmFile=./out/checkers_nft.wasm --accountId $CONTRACT_NAME`

`near call $CONTRACT_NAME new_with_default_meta '{"owner_id": "checkers.near"}' --accountId $CONTRACT_NAME` 

- Mint NFT

 
```
near call $CONTRACT_NAME nft_mint '{"token_id": "casino", "receiver_id": "checkers.near", "token_metadata": {"title": "NFT Checkers: Casino", "description": "NFT for NEAR Checkers: Casino", "media": "data:image/png;base64,", "copies": 1}}' --accountId checkers.near --deposit 0.15
```

```
near call $CONTRACT_NAME nft_mint '{"token_id": "chip", "receiver_id": "zavodil.near", "token_metadata": {"title": "NFT checkers: Chip", "description": "NFT for NEAR Checkers: Chip", "media": "data:image/png;base64,", "copies": 1}}' --accountId checkers.near --deposit 0.15
```

```
near call $CONTRACT_NAME nft_mint '{"token_id": "beer", "receiver_id": "place.testnet", "token_metadata": {"title": "Casino checkers", "description": "NFT for NEAR Checkers beer style", "media": "data:image/png;base64,", "copies": 1}}' --accountId checkers.near --deposit 0.15
```

Transfer NFT

```
near call $CONTRACT_NAME nft_transfer '{"receiver_id": "whendacha.near", "token_id": "casino"}' --accountId checkers.near --depositYocto 1
```

Check tokens

```
near view $CONTRACT_NAME nft_tokens_for_owner '{"account_id": "checkers.near"}'
```

near call $CONTRACT_NAME nft_transfer '{"receiver_id": "grant.testnet", "token_id": "nft-beer"}' --accountId place.testnet --depositYocto 1

Near-rusty-chekers Smart Contract
==================

A [smart contract] written in [Rust] for an app initialized with [create-near-app]


Quick Start
===========

Before you compile this code, you will need to install Rust with [correct target]


Exploring The Code
==================

1. The main smart contract code lives in `src/lib.rs`. You can compile it with
   the `./compile` script.
2. Tests: You can run smart contract tests with the `./test` script. This runs
   standard Rust tests using [cargo] with a `--nocapture` flag so that you
   can see any debug info you print to the console.


  [smart contract]: https://docs.near.org/docs/develop/contracts/overview
  [Rust]: https://www.rust-lang.org/
  [create-near-app]: https://github.com/near/create-near-app
  [correct target]: https://github.com/near/near-sdk-rs#pre-requisites
  [cargo]: https://doc.rust-lang.org/book/ch01-03-hello-cargo.html
